alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:26AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rankin, southeastern Hinds and north central Copiah Counties through 815 AM CST... At 726 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dry Grove, or 8 miles northwest of Crystal Springs, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Byram and Terry around 740 AM CST. Whites around 745 AM CST. Richland, Star, Florence and Monterey around 750 AM CST. Piney Woods around 755 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central Mississippi.
